name: Blocky Wanted
description:
Bank vault is empty! ... You got the cash! ... Now get out and survive!

As your wanted level increases you must escape from Sheriffs, Police, Swat and the Army.

Drive the streets using the many autos (cars, trucks, helicopters, aeroplanes)

Shoot down enemies and collect the square coins (Squoins!?) to unlock awesome new weapons

Pistol, Rifles, Grenades, ROCKET LAUNCHER and the ultimate ATTACK HELICOPTER

Share your best time with your friends and don't forget ... Your Wanted !!

* Free Roaming world
* Many weapons and Cars
* Draw heat with your antics
* Superb Graphics
* Share your time
